counterRef=useRef(null);const finalValues={customers:50000,restaurants:200,orders:1000000,rating:4.8};useEffect(()=>{const observer=new IntersectionObserver(entries=>{if(entries[0].isIntersecting&&!hasAnimated){animateCounters();setHasAnimated(true);}},{threshold:0.3});if(counterRef.current){observer.observe(counterRef.current);}return()=>{if(counterRef.current){observer.unobserve(counterRef.current);}};},[hasAnimated]);const
